rukus.text: ane a loko tamane “ruha” vise savala kare che tame javaba api do ke, “ruha” mara palanaharana adesathi che ane tamane khuba ja ochum jnana apavamam avyum che
ane jo ame icchi'e to je vahi tamari tarapha avatarita kari che badhum ja chinavi la'i'e, pachi tamane tena mate amari virud'dha ko'i madada karanara nahim mali sake
tamara palanaharani krpa sivaya, ni:Sanka tamara para teni ghani ja krpa che
Kahi do ke jo dareka manavi ane dareka jinnato mali a kura'ana jevum lavava icche to, te dareka mate bhega maline pana ana jevum lavavum asakya che, bhalene te'o eka bijani madada karanara bani jaya
ame to a kura'anamam lokone samajava mate dareka rite ghana udaharanonum varnana kari didhum che, parantu vadhare padata loko inkara karavanum chodata nathi
te loko'e kahyum ke ame tamara para kyareya imana nahim lavi'e, tyam sudhi ke tame amara mate dharati manthi ko'i jharanum vahetum na kari do
athava tamara mate ko'i bagico hoya khajura ane draksano ane teni vacce tame ghani nahero vahavi batavo
athava tame akasane amara para tukade tukada kari padi do, jevum ke tamaro vicara che athava tame pote allaha ta'alane ane pharista'one amari samaksa ubha kari batavo

athava tamara mate ko'i sonanum ghara bani jaya, athava tame akasa para cadhi batavo, ane ame to tamarum cadhi javum pana te samaya sudhi kyareya nahim mani'e, jyam sudhi ke tame amara mate ko'i kitaba na la'i avo, jene ame pote padhi la'i'e, tame javaba api do ke maro palanahara pavitra che, hum to phakta eka manusya ja chum, jene payagambara banavavamam avyo che
